_comment: Agent that starts in the workspace root
name: workspace-agent
description: Agent for managing the entire workspace

_comment: Agent that starts in a specific project
name: project-mgmt-ux-agent

_comment: Agent that starts in the first available repo
name: project-repo-agent
description: Agent for working on project code

_comment: Agent that starts in a specific package
name: v1-client-agent
description: Agent for Claude Flow V1 client development

_comment: Agent that starts in a specific path
name: path-agent

_comment: Agent with no CWD configuration (uses current directory)
name: default-agent
description: Agent that starts in its own directory
